price: " 'Por certo, foi-nos revelado que o castigo será sobre quem desmente a Mensagem e volta as costas.' "
arabic: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā anna al-ʿadhāba ʿalā man kadhaba watawallā
